name: Hard Times (itch) (SlayerWx, fermingimpel, Agus0.0, Goran Blazevich, SantiagoBarra, Rojoin)
name_original: Hard Times (itch) (SlayerWx, fermingimpel, Agus0.0, Goran Blazevich, SantiagoBarra, Rojoin)
description:
Over time, machines managed to surpass and colonize man. A source of entertainment they have is one of the first created by man, battles to death in an arena. You will have to put yourself in the shoes of an enslaved human, forced to fight for his life for the enjoyment of the machines. Your destiny is already signed, the important thing is to take with you as many enemies as possible to have a vengeful and honorable death.
